fields.headline: Broadband conference Wi-Fi blocking
fields.bodyText: If you were here earlier, you might notice a couple of posts that were made many hours earlier but never appeared. Well, I spent the day at the Rural and Regional Broadband Conference in London, where I was pleased to find there was a Wi-Fi network. It was set up so you could browse the Web, but you couldn't send POP3 e-mail and you couldn't blog -- or at least, not with Blogger. The Register has reported the conference.
